additional_info:
Storeroom, Furniture, Technique, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Elevator, Heating system: central 
 Appartment for Rent on Saburtalo Street, in   a new building  Axis Palace, Renovated apartment of 76 square meters. 1 master  bedroom (with separate bathroom), living room and kitchen , a second toilet, balcony. Apartments are equipped with new furniture and technik. (Dishwasher, washing machine, refrigerator, 127 cm. Led TV, electric oven and athers. Entrance  as  Hotel lobby, 24-hour security. The entrance and elevator with individual  cards. Viw on  Lisi Lake side, 10 floor.

details.address: Tbilisi, Saburtalo,  Saburtalo, S. Tsintsadze st.
